text: Avia Solutions Group is a global provider of aviation capacity solutions for passenger and cargo airlines. It was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland. The group manages over 100 offices and production facilities worldwide, with a majority of its employees based in Europe. As of June 2023, the group manages a fleet of 180 aircraft among its companies. Over the years, Avia Solutions Group has expanded its services and acquired various aviation- related companies, covering areas such as ground handling, aircraft maintenance, training, charter flights, and more. == References == Category:Airlines Category:Companies of Ireland
title: Avia Solutions Group
